org.apache.poi.hslf.usermodel

Class HSLFTextRun

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.hslf.usermodel.HSLFTextRun
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TextRun 

    public final class HSLFTextRun
extends java.lang.Object
implements TextRun
    Represents a run of text, all with the same style(代表一系列文本，所有文本都具有相同的风格)

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.apache.poi.sl.usermodel.TextRun

        TextRun.FieldType, TextRun.TextCap

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HSLFTextRun(HSLFTextParagraph parentParagraph)
      Create a new wrapper around a rich text string(围绕富文本字符串创建新包装)

      • getSuperscript

        public int getSuperscript()
        Gets the subscript/superscript option(获取脚注/superScript选项)
        Returns:
        the percentage of the font size. If the value is positive, it is superscript, otherwise it is subscript(字体大小的百分比。如果值为正，则为标，否则为标)

      • setSuperscript

        public void setSuperscript(int val)
        Sets the subscript/superscript option(设置脚注/superScript选项)
        Parameters:
        val - the percentage of the font size. If the value is positive, it is superscript, otherwise it is subscript(val -字体大小的百分比。如果值为正，则为标，否则为标)

      • getFontSize

        public java.lang.Double getFontSize()
        Description copied from interface: TextRun
        Returns the font size which is either set directly on this text run or given from the slide layout(返回直接在此文本运行中设置或从幻灯片布局中给定的字体大小)
        Specified by:
        getFontSize in interface TextRun(文本运行界面中的getFontSize)
        Returns:
        font size in points or null if font size is not set.(字体大小以点为单位，如果未设置字体大小，则为空。)

      • setFontSize

        public void setFontSize(java.lang.Double fontSize)
        Description copied from interface: TextRun
        Sets the font size directly on this text run, if null is given, the font size defaults to the values given from the slide layout(直接在此文本运行中设置字体大小，如果指定为null，则字体大小默认为幻灯片布局中指定的值)
        Specified by:
        setFontSize in interface TextRun(文本运行界面中的setFontSize)
        Parameters:
        fontSize - font size in points, if null the underlying fontsize will be unset(fontSize -以磅为单位的字体大小，如果为空，则不设置基础字体大小)

      • setFontFamily

        public void setFontFamily(java.lang.String typeface)
        Description copied from interface: TextRun
        Specifies the typeface, or name of the font that is to be used for this text run - convenience method for calling TextRun.setFontInfo(FontInfo, FontGroup) with just a font name(指定字体或用于此文本运行的字体名称-仅使用字体名称即可调用TextRun.setFontInfo（FontInfo，FontGroup）的方便方法)
        Specified by:
        setFontFamily in interface TextRun(文本运行界面中的setFontFamily)
        Parameters:
        typeface - the font to apply to this text run. The value of null removes the run specific font setting, so the default setting is activated again.(字体-应用于此文本运行的字体。空值会删除运行特定的字体设置，因此默认设置将再次激活。)

      • setFontFamily

        public void setFontFamily(java.lang.String typeface,
                          FontGroup fontGroup)
        Description copied from interface: TextRun
        Specifies the typeface, or name of the font that is to be used for this text run - convenience method for calling TextRun.setFontInfo(FontInfo, FontGroup) with just a font name(指定字体或用于此文本运行的字体名称-仅使用字体名称即可调用TextRun.setFontInfo（FontInfo，FontGroup）的方便方法)
        Specified by:
        setFontFamily in interface TextRun(文本运行界面中的setFontFamily)
        Parameters:
        typeface - the font to apply to this text run. The value of null removes the run specific font setting, so the default setting is activated again.(字体-应用于此文本运行的字体。空值会删除运行特定的字体设置，因此默认设置将再次激活。)
        fontGroup - the font group, i.e. the range of glpyhs to be covered. if null, the font group matching the first character will be returned(fontGroup -字体组，即要涵盖的glpyhs范围。如果为空，将返回与第一个字符匹配的字体组)

      • setFontInfo

        public void setFontInfo(FontInfo fontInfo,
                        FontGroup fontGroup)
        Description copied from interface: TextRun
        Specifies the font to be used for this text run.(指定此文本运行使用的字体。)
        Specified by:
        setFontInfo in interface TextRun(文本运行界面中的setFontInfo)
        Parameters:
        fontInfo - the font to apply to this text run. The value of null removes the run specific font setting, so the default setting is activated again.(fontInfo -应用于此文本运行的字体。空值会删除运行特定的字体设置，因此默认设置将再次激活。)
        fontGroup - the font group, i.e. the range of glpyhs to be covered. defaults to latin, if null.(fontGroup -字体组，即要涵盖的glpyhs范围。如果为空，默认为拉丁语。)

      • getFontFamily

        public java.lang.String getFontFamily()

        Specified by:
        getFontFamily in interface TextRun(文本运行界面中的getFontFamily)
        Returns:
        font family or null if not set(字体系列或空（如果未设置）)

        Parameters:

      • getFontColor

        public PaintStyle.SolidPaint getFontColor()
        Description copied from interface: TextRun
        Returns the font color. This usually returns a PaintStyle.SolidPaint, but but also other classes are possible(返回字体颜色。这通常返回PaintStyle.SolidPaint，但也可以返回其他类)
        Specified by:
        getFontColor in interface TextRun(文本运行界面中的getFontColor)
        Returns:
        font color as PaintStyle(字体颜色为PaintStyle)
        See Also:
        DrawPaint.getPaint(java.awt.Graphics2D, PaintStyle), PaintStyle.SolidPaint.getSolidColor(), DrawPaint.applyColorTransform(ColorStyle)

      • setFontColor

        public void setFontColor(int bgr)
        Sets color of the text, as a int bgr. (PowerPoint stores as BlueGreenRed, not the more usual RedGreenBlue)(设置文本的颜色，作为int bGR。（PowerPoint存储为BlueGreenRed，而不是更常见的RedGreenBlue）)
        See Also:
        Color

      • createHyperlink

        public HSLFHyperlink createHyperlink()
        Description copied from interface: TextRun
        Creates a new hyperlink and assigns it to this text run. If the text run has already a hyperlink assigned, return it instead(创建新超链接并将其分配给此文本运行。如果文本运行已经分配了超链接，请返回它)
        Specified by:
        createHyperlink in interface TextRun(文本运行界面中的超链接)
        Returns:
        the associated hyperlink(关联的超链接)

      • getFieldType

        public TextRun.FieldType getFieldType()
        Description copied from interface: TextRun
        Experimental method to determine the field type, e.g. slide number(确定字段类型（例如载玻片编号）的实验方法)
        Specified by:
        getFieldType in interface TextRun(文本运行界面中的getFieldType)
        Returns:
        the field type or null if text run is not a field(如果文本运行不是字段，则字段类型或空)

      • getParagraph

        public HSLFTextParagraph getParagraph()
        Specified by:
        getParagraph in interface TextRun(文本运行界面中的getPartridge)
        Returns:
        the paragraph which contains this TextRun(包含此文本运行的段落)
